Service Details: - Provides regular transit service within the Kelowna, West Kelowna, Westbank First Nations and Lake Country areas; fully accessible buses; fixed schedules; buses do not deviate from routes- Provides community bus service to residents of Peachland, McCulloch, Mission and West Kelowna with fully accessible vehicles;  flexible schedules; buses can deviate from route to pick up passengers living beyond normal walk limits or those with disabilities; route deviation times are limited, and a minimum one day advance notice is required; transfer to/from regular transit service
Cost: Please visit the website, call the bus hotline or pick up a transit Rider's Guide on any bus for ticket prices and schedules
Address & Map: FirstCanada ULC1494 Hardy StKelowna, BC     V1Y 8H2
